rel.why: Global layout components (Header/Footer) map to the UI layout spec.
CookieBanner and ConsentScripts map to cookie consent requirements.

notes: components/ui is reserved for shadcn/ui components; currently empty.
components/sections exists but is currently empty.

groups.name: layout
groups.purpose: Global layout components used across pages (header/footer).

groups.name: privacy
groups.purpose: Cookie consent UI and consent-related scripts/components.

groups.name: sections
groups.purpose: Page section modules (hero, CTA, feature grids, etc.).

groups.name: ui
groups.purpose: Reserved for shadcn/ui primitives and shared UI components.
